name: Yabe Kokoro
author: Rosua

sections.description:
Yabe Kokoro: the #1 Oxygen design sets manager with e-commerce integration.

Yabe Kokoro is an Oxygen design sets manager plugin for designers to reuse their design sets in other projects.
Its e-commerce integration allows you to sell your design sets with easy.

FEATURES

Yabe Kokoro is packed full of features designed to streamline your workflow. Some of our favorites are:

  • License system: The complete license key generation, activation, and checking system.
  • Remotes manager: Connect to multiple design sets sources.
  • Cross compatibility: It works with the built-in Oxygen design sets system.
  • Easy to use: Connect and manage the design sets with a simple, intuitive interface.
  • Lightweight and blazingly fast: The license system is built on Oxygen’s built-in system, WordPress REST API, and a modern JavaScript framework for an instant, responsive user experience. It has a small footprint and won’t slow down your site.
  • E-commerce integration: Sell your design sets with ease. Yabe Kokoro is integrated with the most popular e-commerce plugins.

SEAMLESS INTEGRATION

It’s easy to sell your design sets thanks to the seamless integration with the most popular e-commerce plugins:

  • WooCommerce
  • Easy Digital Downloads [Pro]
  • SureCart [Soon] [Pro]

Visit our website for more information.

Love Yabe Kokoro?

  • Purchase the Pro version
  • Join our Facebook Group
  • Or rate us on WordPress

Credits

  • Image by Freepik on Flaticon
sections.changelog:
Note: The Pro version has a version number with one higher first digit than the Free version.

For instance:
Free version 1.0.5
Pro version 2.0.5

1.0.7

  • Fix: Plugin requirements checking issue

1.0.6

  • New: Yabe Kokoro Lite is now available on WordPress.org

1.0.5

  • Improve: Follow the WordPress guidelines

1.0.1

  • New: Lite version released

1.0.0

  • New: Plugin rebuilt from scratch

0.0.0

  • üê£ Initial release.
